item.title: Menstrual hygiene crisis impacts over 1.6 lakh girls in Raichur & Yadgir
item.description: <![CDATA[Raichur: The initiative aimed at reducing school absenteeism among higher primary and high school girls during their menstrual periods, as well as supplying quality menstrual pads to underprivileged students in the Raichur education district, which encompasses Yadgir district, has ceased operations.After a four-year break, the Karnataka govt revived the â€˜Shuchi' scheme in February last year. This programme focuses on delivering sanitary napkins to roughly 19 lakh adolescent girls studying in gov...]]>
item.author: Tnn, Chamaraj Savadi
